com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

クラス NCMBAcl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBAcl

  • public class NCMBAcl
extends java.lang.Object
    NCMBAcl class contains acl setting for datastore , user , role
